snippet: Four people were injured in a shooting outside a Portland high school on Friday, throwing an area in the north end of the city into chaos.
abstract: Four people are wounded in shooting outside Rosemary Anderson High School in Portland, Ore; police believe attack is gang related.
lead_paragraph: Four people were injured in a shooting outside a Portland high school on Friday, throwing an area in the north end of the city into chaos.

headline.main: Oregon: 4 Hurt in Shooting Near Portland High School
headline.print_headline: Oregon: 4 Hurt in Shooting Near School
